slide.title: get_class()
slide.example:
<?php
	class TheNetherlands {
		var $area;
		function TheNetherlands($area) {
			$this->area = $area;
		}
	}

	$holland = new TheNetherlands('Holland');

	echo get_class($holland), "\n";
?>
slide.blurb: The same is true for get_parent_class() and get_class_methods().
